item1: NEER provides commodities-related products customers, engages energy-related commodity marketing trading activities includes operations retail electricity provider ownership interests natural gas oil shale formations located primarily South region U.S. Through NextEra Energy Resources' subsidiary, NextEra Energy Marketing, LLC, NEER: manages risk associated fluctuating commodity prices optimizes value NEER's power generation natural gas oil production assets through use swaps, options, futures forwards; sells output NEER's plants not sold under long-term contracts procures fuel use NEER's generation fleet; provides full energy capacity requirements customers; markets trades energy-related commodity products, including power fuel, well marketing trading services customers. MARKETS COMPETITION Electricity markets U.S. Canada regional diverse character.
